mapper.select: SELECT t1.`name`, t2.id AS productId, t2.`name` AS productName, t2.image1 AS image, t2.market_price AS highPrice, t2.sales_price AS lowPrice, t2.type AS productType FROM temp_activity t1, product t2 WHERE t1.product_id = t2.id ORDER BY t1.name_sequence DESC, t1.product_sequence DESC
SELECT `name` FROM temp_activity GROUP BY `name` ORDER BY name_sequence DESC
SELECT product_id FROM temp_activity_anniversary_product WHERE time_type=#{timeType} ORDER BY sequence DESC
SELECT activities_common_id, image as imageUrl FROM temp_activity_anniversary_group ORDER BY sequence DESC
SELECT product_id FROM temp_activity_anniversary_recommend ORDER BY sequence DESC
SELECT product_id FROM temp_activity_anniversary_current_product WHERE time_type=#{timeType} ORDER BY sequence DESC
SELECT activities_common_id, image as imageUrl FROM temp_activity_anniversary_current_group ORDER BY sequence DESC
SELECT product_id, type FROM temp_activity_anniversary_current_hot_top ORDER BY type ASC,sequence DESC
